title: Product Quality Manager- Softgoods
summary: The Product Quality team is looking for a highly motivated quality professional to support outbound quality management. You will be responsible for sustaining quality management for many of Apple’s Softgoods products.
description:
Use data and field insights to drive ongoing product improvements with cross-functional and OEM partners
Conduct periodic reviews of Field and Factory Quality Data with internal and external partners 
Define and manage ongoing quality testing and associated costs 
Lead quality escalations to closure by applying technical and program management skills 
Lead field quality evaluation after product launch 
Drive quality solutions and best practices across multiple cross-functional teams and supply chain nodes
Consolidate detailed cross-functional data into concise insights for executive briefings 
Ability to travel up to 15%
preferred_qualifications:
Project management experience, including influencing others without direct authority
Experience working with high volume international manufacturers and traveling to manufacturing sites
Results-driven and detail-oriented leadership experience required
Excellent written and verbal communication, proven ability to present effectively to leadership
Data-driven approach to problem solving
Experience with part reliability methods, quality sampling methodologies, and statistical techniques
Finance/business acumen – understand cost drivers and derive/optimize costs associated with managing quality
Experience managing consumer product performance in the field (“eye of the customer”)
Technical knowledge related to Softgoods products is a plus
Experience with packout & supply chain logistics is a plus
